title: Does gas-phase sulfur dioxide remove films of atmosphere-extracted organic material from the aqueous aerosol air–water interface?
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00098F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Edward J. Stuckey, Rebecca J. L. Welbourn, Stephanie H. Jones, Alexander J. Armstrong, Matthew Wilkinson, James I. L. Morison, Martin D. King
Molecularly thin films of atmosphere-extracted material at the air–water interface may be altered but are not removed by sulfur dioxide.
